snippet: “It remains the objective that Sochi will be the fifth consecutive Olympics with N.H.L. participation,” Bill Daly, the deputy commissioner of the N.H.L., said on Friday.
abstract: “It remains the objective that Sochi will be the fifth consecutive Olympics with N.H.L. participation,” Bill Daly, the deputy commissioner of the N.H.L., said on Friday.

headline.main: N.H.L. Proceeds as if Its Players Will Play in Sochi
